title: Personalized Support Strategies for Problem-Solving-Based Science Learning

context.prior_knowledge: Foundational science knowledge and problem-solving experience
context.additional_context: Learning environment designed to experience scientific problem-solving processes in smartphone-based simulation/VR settings

learning_goals: Learners can design personalized learning paths reflecting their cognitive structures in the scientific problem-solving process
Learners can systematically diagram relationships between concepts through problem-solving scenario analysis
Learners can adjust learning strategies by categorizing formative assessment feedback into three levels (positive/negative/neutral)

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
